skills.name: Windrider Bullet
skills.description: Deals Wind DMG equal to {1}% of Bronya's ATK to a single enemy.

skills.name: Combat Redeployment
skills.description: Dispels a debuff from a single ally, allows them to immediately take action, and increases their DMG by {1}% for 1 turn(s). When this Skill is used on Bronya herself, she cannot immediately take action again.

skills.name: The Belobog March
skills.description: Increases the ATK of all allies by {0}%, and increases their CRIT DMG equal to {1}% of Bronya's CRIT DMG plus {2}% for 2 turn(s).

skills.name: Leading the Way
skills.description: After using her Basic ATK, Bronya's next action will be Advanced Forward by {1}%.

skills.name: Banner of Command
skills.description: After using Bronya's Technique, at the start of the next battle, all allies' ATK increases by 15% for 2 turn(s).

eidolons.name: Hone Your Strength
eidolons.description: Using Bronya's Skill has a 50% fixed chance of recovering 1 Skill Point. This effect has a 1 turn cooldown.

eidolons.name: Quick March
eidolons.description: When using Skill, the target ally's SPD increases by 30% after taking action, lasting for 1 turn.

eidolons.name: Bombardment
eidolons.description: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Talent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15.

eidolons.name: Take by Surprise
eidolons.description: After an ally uses Basic ATK on an enemy with Wind Weakness, Bronya immediately launches a follow-up attack on the target, dealing Wind DMG equal to 80% of Bronya's Basic ATK DMG. This effect can only be triggered 1 time per turn.

eidolons.name: Unstoppable
eidolons.description: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. 15. Basic ATK Lv. +1. up to a maximum of Lv. 10.

eidolons.name: Piercing Rainbow
eidolons.description: The duration of the DMG Boost effect placed by the Skill on the target ally increases by 1 turn(s).
